title: Failed to load data error when My Group View is used
content:
A ‘Failed to load data’ error occurs when using My Group View to display records assigned to the groups that the currently logged-in user belongs to. For example: My Group Inbox, My Group Tasks, and so on.

Cause

When a logged-in user is a member of numerous user groups, using My Group View can cause the Request URL length in the browser to exceed the maximum limit due to the application of filters on so many user groups.

Solution

Remove all the default filters and manually apply filters to the necessary groups.
It is recommended that each user be a member of only a few hundred groups, ideally not exceeding 500, to ensure optimal performance during data retrieval when using the "My Group" view. This view allows users to see the records assigned to the groups of which they are currently a member.
